name: react-elastislide
description: A customizable React slider component supporting images, videos, or HTML content with smooth elastic scrolling animations and flexible slide types.

scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: copyfiles -u 1 src/assets/**/* dist/esm/ && copyfiles -u 1 src/assets/**/* dist/cjs/ && copyfiles -u 1 src/assets/**/* dist/types/ && copyfiles -u 1 src/components/**/assets/**/* dist/esm/ && copyfiles -u 1 src/components/**/assets/**/* dist/cjs/ && copyfiles -u 1 src/components/**/assets/**/* dist/types/

author: JJ
